headline: NRG Energy, Inc. Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: NRG Energy, Inc. today announced that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend on the Company’s common stock of $0.44 per share, or $1.76 per share on an annualized basis. This dividend...
